long_description:
= RightScale MySQL Database Cookbook

== DESCRIPTION:

Provides the MySQL implementation of the 'db' resource to install and manage
MySQL database stand-alone servers and clients.

== REQUIREMENTS:

* Requires a VM launched from a RightScale managed RightImage.

== COOKBOOKS DEPENDENCIES:

Please see <tt>metadata.rb</tt> file for the latest dependencies.

== KNOWN LIMITATIONS:

There are no known limitiations.

== SETUP:

* Place the <tt>db_mysql::default</tt> recipe into your runlist to load the
  MySQL provider, tuning parameters, as well as other MySQL specific attributes
  in as inputs.

* Place <tt>db::default</tt> recipe into your runlist to setup the db resource.
  When using a RightScale ServerTemplate, this will also automatically add the
  common database attributes to your ServerTemplate inputs.

== USAGE:

=== Basic usage

Once setup, use the recipes in the 'db' cookbook to install and manage your
MySQL database servers and clients. See the <tt>db/README.rdoc</tt> for usage
details.

=== MySQL Tuning and my.cnf

Custom tuning parameters can be applied by overriding the
<tt>mysql_tuning.rb</tt> attributes file. For more information and an example
override repository please see:
https://github.com/ekargard/cookbooks_override/tree/master/cookbooks/db_mysql

== DETAILS:

The 'db' implementation is defined by a Lightweight Provider, which can be
found in the <tt>providers/default.rb</tt> file.

db_mysql/server_usage.description: Use 'dedicated' if the mysql config file allocates all existing resources of the machine.  Use 'shared' if the MySQL config file is configured to use less resources so that it can be run concurrently with other apps like Apache and Rails for example.

db_mysql/log_bin.description: Defines the filename and location of your MySQL stored binlog files.  This sets the log-bin variable in the MySQL config file. Ex: /mnt/mysql-binlogs/mysql-bin

db_mysql/tmpdir.description: Defines the location of your MySQL temp directory.  This sets the tmpdir variable in the MySQL config file. Ex: /tmp

db_mysql/version.description: Specify the MySQL version that matches that of the Database Manager for MySQL ServerTemplate version in use. Note: MySQL 5.5 is not supported on Ubuntu 10.04.

description: Installs/configures a MySQL database client and server.

recipes.db_mysql::default: Set DB MySQL provider, set version and node variables specific to the chosen MySQL version
recipes.db_mysql::default_5_5: Set DB MySQL provider, set version 5.5 and node variables specific to MySQL 5.5
recipes.db_mysql::default_5_1: Set DB MySQL provider, set version 5.1 and node variables specific to MySQL 5.1
